name: Solarpunk Style
description:
This model was trained on over 1,100 images of solarpunk culture and aesthetics. It is particularly good at cozy houses, amazing characters and futuristic towns but is extremely flexible given the wide amount of training data. It'll put plants and solar panels on anything you want.

Ecology: permaculture, food forests, urban gardening, vertical farms, aquaponics, wastewater agriculture, mycelium, rewilding, bacterial treatment and compost
Architecture: earthships, geodesics, ecocities, treehouses, hobbit houses, greenhouses, cob, bamboo, hemp, furniture, wildlife bridges, vertical gardens, vertical farms, biophilia
Technology: solar, wind, biogas, robots, drones, biomimicry, bioengineered vehicle augmented reality interfaces, magic, flying trains, biohacking, symbiotic systems
Fashion: punk, solarpunk, afropunk, latinpunk, cyberpunk, cyborg, bohemian, garden workwear, arts and crafts movement and art noveau

Tips for use:
style_solarpunk - stronger at the beginning of your prompt, very diverse so do large batches
anti_solarpunk - negative prompt that, mostly removes text, barren landscapes, destruction and urban decay. Also removes some deformities and blurriness but its still worth using other fixers too.

Use this model freely to make the world a better place. No commercial use though, because this is solarpunk so skip the capitalism

meta.prompt: a  futuristic permaculture rainforest with a house, style_solarpunk,  High Detail, Sharp focus, trending on artstation, Digital art,
meta.negativePrompt: text, anti_solarpunk ,nude, nsfw, NFIXER, NARTFIXER, NREALFIXER, logo, , Watermark, bad artist, blur, blurry, b&w, Glasses 3d, bad art, poorly drawn, disfigured, deformed
